body: This just looks like screenshots from the anime but paneled,

So four years after and still to be continued... *sadface :(* I really wish MC got together with Ginko (ayakashi phantom fox girl) in the end (like who cares if ayakashi & human can't be together cuz they aren't same races, just love each other!).
there is an anime for this actually which is quite nice
I don't like the hentai ver., but the doujin ver. is almost the same shit xD (well it's a litthe better uwu)
